column5: Melchett lake report via remi and awo outfitters out of nakina. 1305 total fish (probably 1250 eyes) from four guys in only four days. Biggest pike was 40 on a jig no leader, biggest eye was 23. Absolutely fantastic fishing all day every day. One day each guy caught over 100 eyes before dinner. If you go, contact me for specific info
Thanks for the report.....sounds like a great trip
Well that sure sounds like they were biting. I know a 7 day trip is short so a 4 dayer you don't even need to bring a change of clothes. Glad to enjoyed it.
How was the water level on melchett.
Heading to Melchett this Friday. Been there a number of times. Anything new at the cabin? Where were your hotspots?
Sounds like a great time and you can't beat the lakes north of Nakina.
Hey flipdip, The cabin has a new mirror. Took it up in May to shave with. The fishing was great again. Just wish I was there now .LOL
How was the fishing on mellchett. did you get my PM
